001
002package com.commercetools.api.models.order;
003
004import static com.commercetools.api.models.common.MoneyUtil.zeroAmount;
005
006import java.time.ZonedDateTime;
007import java.util.List;
008import java.util.Optional;
009
010import javax.money.MonetaryAmount;
011import javax.validation.Valid;
012import javax.validation.constraints.NotNull;
013
014import com.commercetools.api.models.cart.*;
015import com.commercetools.api.models.cart_discount.CartDiscountReference;
016import com.commercetools.api.models.common.*;
017import com.commercetools.api.models.customer_group.CustomerGroupReference;
018import com.commercetools.api.models.store.StoreKeyReference;
019import com.commercetools.api.models.type.CustomFields;
020
021public interface OrderLike<T extends OrderLike<T>> {
022    @NotNull
023    public String getId();
024
025    @NotNull
026    public Long getVersion();
027
028    @NotNull
029    public ZonedDateTime getCreatedAt();
030
031    @NotNull
032    public ZonedDateTime getLastModifiedAt();
033
034    @Valid
035    public LastModifiedBy getLastModifiedBy();
036
037    @Valid
038    public CreatedBy getCreatedBy();
039
040    public String getCustomerId();
041
042    public String getCustomerEmail();
043
044    public String getAnonymousId();
045
046    @Valid
047    public StoreKeyReference getStore();
048
049    @NotNull
050    @Valid
051    public List<LineItem> getLineItems();
052
053    @NotNull
054    @Valid
055    public List<CustomLineItem> getCustomLineItems();
056
057    @NotNull
058    @Valid
059    public TypedMoney getTotalPrice();
060
061    @Valid
062    public TaxedPrice getTaxedPrice();
063
064    @Valid
065    public Address getShippingAddress();
066
067    @Valid
068    public Address getBillingAddress();
069
070    public InventoryMode getInventoryMode();
071
072    @NotNull
073    public TaxMode getTaxMode();
074
075    @NotNull
076    public RoundingMode getTaxRoundingMode();
077
078    @NotNull
079    public TaxCalculationMode getTaxCalculationMode();
080
081    @Valid
082    public CustomerGroupReference getCustomerGroup();
083
084    public String getCountry();
085
086    @Valid
087    public ShippingInfo getShippingInfo();
088
089    @Valid
090    public List<DiscountCodeInfo> getDiscountCodes();
091
092    @Valid
093    public CustomFields getCustom();
094
095    @Valid
096    public PaymentInfo getPaymentInfo();
097
098    public String getLocale();
099
100    @NotNull
101    @Valid
102    public List<CartDiscountReference> getRefusedGifts();
103
104    @NotNull
105    public CartOrigin getOrigin();
106
107    @Valid
108    public ShippingRateInput getShippingRateInput();
109
110    @Valid
111    public List<Address> getItemShippingAddresses();
112
113    default public MonetaryAmount calculateSubTotalPrice() {
114        final MonetaryAmount lineItemTotal = this.getLineItems()
115                .stream()
116                .map(LineItem::getTotalPrice)
117                .map(MonetaryAmountConvertable::toMonetaryAmount)
118                .reduce(zeroAmount(Optional.ofNullable(this.getTotalPrice()).map(Money::getCurrencyCode).orElse(null)),
119                    MonetaryAmount::add);
120        final MonetaryAmount customLineItemTotal = this.getCustomLineItems()
121                .stream()
122                .map(CustomLineItem::getTotalPrice)
123                .map(MonetaryAmountConvertable::toMonetaryAmount)
124                .reduce(zeroAmount(Optional.ofNullable(this.getTotalPrice()).map(Money::getCurrencyCode).orElse(null)),
125                    MonetaryAmount::add);
126        return lineItemTotal.add(customLineItemTotal);
127    }
128}
